casebody.data:
NATIONAL REGULATOR COMPANY, Plaintiff, v. ABCO BOILER COMPANY, Defendant. Ex parte Robert McC. MARSH, Receiver, Appellee, Joseph Spatt and Edward J. Gould, Appellants. No. 355. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. June 2, 1930.

Before L. HAND, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree [42 F.(2d) 712] affirmed.
